title: Ptah Thothmes
text:
I capture my audiences attention with great visualizations on the landing page of my websites.
By using a video at the entry to some my websites I give my audience the emotional impact they are seeking when they are thinking about a particular product. The video acts as an extension of what they had in their imagination when they are searching for the product and allows them to immerse themselves in their original thoughts, when they considered the product purchase selection and use.
By placing a video on the landing page of my websites and optimizing for mobile applications I give my potential audience an immediate vibration that they can relate to and experience connected to the product(s).
My websites are now the cutting edge in many aspects and having the video right up front announces a different, more user-friendly experience in the way that I construct my websites.
